channel.title: what I do on Mathematical Michael
channel.description: Recent content in what I do on Mathematical Michael

item.title: art
item.description: Probably Art Start with today. Show biggest achievement. How did we get here? Probability-Dependent Generative Artwork. It was the first experience I had with GUIs, and then the same theme tied together this project. Real-time visualization of randomness, now used to aid in design. I want to find more projects like this. Description Describe your relationship to art. History Moving Pictures summer 2013 History… early Gallery Project Probably Art context Project Present code exists here and needs major reorganization.

item.title: estimation
item.description: (AKA the Monte-Carlo Calculator) talk about research, wanting to make something useful, something to share. The Oracle is a web app I built to help me make quick estimates without keeping them in my head (and then share them!). Often we find “back-of-the-napkin” calculations to be useful… randall munroe what if … fermi problems wiki … TK TK TK It is deployed with #kubernetes on #google-cloud-platform and is built with #python using #flask.

item.title: open-source software
item.description: Sofware Contributions ML Starter-Packs ml-starter-packs is a Github organization I created to house relatively polished projects for public consumption. These are the tools I find myself coming back to over and over, whether for educational or development purposes. MUD

item.title: etc
item.description: More Projects Consider this a dumping ground for links to things I want to show people I’ve done. Academic Research I worked to develop new ways of quantifying and reducing uncertainty. Academic Research Academic Research Mind the Grow here I embed a link in a sentence to give context Code Math Club Repository Archive Twitterbots Prior Oracle Twitter Account Consulting Visit Website
